title: HEY Guys quite recently people have been programming bots of their own to boost in AI games
body: OK guys there has been 20 minute + games where this 1 person has only bought 1 item, never talks and always in bot games you knoww.... you can tell there is no person behind that screen. you can google it yourself, there are programs that are 'league of legends bots' people use programs to get to level 30 in player vs ai and sell these accounts on websites. so please guys. STOP THE BOTS. Add another report option to report as BOT or something. thanks.

yea i see these almost everyday in AI.  I play a lot of AI as I'm trying to relearn a lot of the game since returning after a long lay off.  Sometimes they will just walk around spawn, others will walk around their tower.  Some will even act somewhat normally like the in game bots.  It doesn't take a genius to spot them.   Unfortunately I don't think many people report them.  People don't seem to care.  Maybe because they don't understand how things like that can seriously harm a game in the long run.
